sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-chart class="chart" :option="option" />
</template>

<script>
import { use } from "echarts/core";
import { CanvasRenderer } from "echarts/renderers";
import { BarChart } from "echarts/charts";
import {
  GridComponent,
  DatasetComponent,
  LegendComponent,
  TooltipComponent,
} from "echarts/components";
import VChart from "vue-echarts";
import { ref, defineComponent } from "vue";

use([
  CanvasRenderer,
  BarChart,
  GridComponent,
  DatasetComponent,
  LegendComponent,
  TooltipComponent,
]);

export default defineComponent({
  name: "BarPurchase",
  components: {
    VChart,
  },
  setup() {
    const option = ref({
  color:['#2666fa','#5e79b8'],
  legend: {},
  tooltip: {},
  dataset: {
    dimensions: ['product', 'Sales', 'Purchases'],
    source: [
      { product: '2021-11-2', Sales: 1433, Purchases: 857},
      { product: '2021-11-3', Sales: 2831, Purchases: 1734},
      { product: '2021-11-4', Sales: 3000, Purchases: 1652},
      { product: '2021-11-5', Sales: 1724, Purchases: 1539 },
       { product: '2021-11-5', Sales: 1435, Purchases: 1588 }
    ]
  },
  xAxis: { type: 'category' },
  yAxis: {},
  // Declare several bar series, each will be mapped
  // to a column of dataset.source by default.
  series: [{ type: 'bar' }, { type: 'bar' }]
    });

    return { option };
  },
});
</script>

<style scoped>
.chart {
  width: 100%;
}
</style>
